document_data.name: Duilya Evendusk
document_data.mainbody: Duilya Evendusk was an inhabitant of [[Cormanthor]] in the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: At one point, she and a number of her friends employed a mind-linking spell and another to convert [[tripleshroom sherry]] to water as it was drank.
document_data.Description: She was slim, but not as slim as she'd been in her youth.{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor||12}}
document_data.Possessions: She owned a [[bower]].{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor||13}}
document_data.Personality: Until {{yearlink|241}}, she was fearful of facing her lord. She was, however, sadistic enough to hope that the human armathor's hunt was something they could scry on. She turned out to be reasonable enough to help the others attempt to stabilize Cormanthor in light of the human armathor's situation, however.
document_data.Relationships: She had a number of friends whom she let in on every intimate detail. She had grown somewhat distant from her husband in {{yearlink|241}}, but they grew closer on that year.
